title: Did Texas and Arizona See a Spate of Sex Trafficking-Related ‘Breath Mint’ Druggings in 2019?
subtitle: A viral warning enflamed widespread fears about drugs, violence and cross-border kidnappings.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In late 2018 or early 2019, a pattern of druggings and abductions took place in Arizona and Texas whereby human traffickers used breath mints
